document_data.name: Rye
document_data.mainbody: '''Rye''' was a widespread grain-producing [[grass]] found in [[Faer√ªn]] and other realms. It was often ground into [[flour]] in a [[gristmill]] and used for making [[bread]] and [[alcohol]].
document_data.Availability:
* Rye was cultivated for its grain in ancient [[Netheril]] alongside [[wheat]], [[oat]]s, [[bran]], [[spelt]], and [[Timothy (plant)|timothy]].
* Rye crops were grown in the [[Savage Frontier]], such as in the fields of [[Trollbridge]].
* [[Cormyr]] grew and exported rye about the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].{{Cite digital book/Eye of Justice|?|4}}
* The [[Dalelands]] commonly grew rye alongside [[corn]] and [[barley]].
* [[Dwarf|Dwarven]] holds often grew rye, wheat, and barley on the surface nearby and kept the harvest in underground granaries.
* A similar grain plant called [[habbat]] was grown in the [[Obsidian Fields]] outside the [[City of Brass]], and another similar plant called [[crimson rye]] was grown in the nearby [[Sable Forest]].
document_data.Ecology: Rye plants were affected by the [[wheat rust]] blight, which destroyed the plants and their grains during the time of Netheril. The spreading disease was cured in {{yearlinkConvert|3165|NY}} by the [[arcanist]] [[Candlemas]], who used a complex magical ritual to produce a cure and save the crops.
